block.p: Re ''The Universe, Expanding Beyond All Understanding'' (Essay, June 5): Thank you, Dennis Overbye, for your essay about the implications of the continued expansion of the universe. I have never quite internalized the notion that space, which feels finite, is actually infinite. And life, which feels infinite, is finite. Now I know that were I born in the predicted future, space would feel finite. But how will life feel?
Hannah I. Lipman, M.D. New York
